name: Silenced Kyr'Ozch Rifle
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves" "257962" #L "Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 2" "254478" or #L "Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 3" "247326" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves + Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 2 = #L "Silenced Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 2" "257967" Note: The Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 2 needs to be QL250+ or Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves + Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 3 = #L "Silenced Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 3" "257131" Note: The Kyr'Ozch Rifle - Type 3 needs to be QL250+
